titles.title: Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 1/3/1996--Introduced. Amends a specified Federal law making continuing appropriations to extend (for activities for which funding would be available under the appropriations Act for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education and Related Agencies for 1996) the specific termination date of appropriations and authority under the continuing appropriations Act to January 12, 1996 (currently, December 15, 1995).
